name: ICICI Bank Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹10 lakh in the card anniversary year for fee waiver. Rent, government, and education payments excluded from threshold calculation w.e.f. Nov 15, 2024.

addOnCard.note: Supplementary card fee of ₹3,500 + GST applicable as one-time fee for each supplementary card w.e.f. Jan 15, 2026. Prior to this date, add-on cards are free.

latePayment.calculation: Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card is excluded from standard late payment charges
latePayment.note: Late payment charges not applicable for this card as per MITC

overLimit.note: Over-limit charges not applicable for ICICI Bank Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card

existingRelationship.type: High NRV (Net Relationship Value) or Wealth Management Client
existingRelationship.note: Card is invite-only. Typically offered to ICICI Bank Global Private Clients, Wealth Management customers, or those with substantial FD/banking relationship (often 1-2 crore+). May also be offered as upgrade from Emeralde PVC or Sapphiro based on spend history.

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, existing relationship with ICICI Bank, NRV, and spend history on existing ICICI cards
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history, increased NRV, or relationship upgrade

gracePeriod.note: Interest-free period ranges from 18 to 48 days depending on transaction date. Grace period of 3 days after payment due date.

minPayment.calculation: 5% of total outstanding or ₹200, whichever is higher. Includes unpaid minimum due from previous statements.

cashAdvance.note: No cash advance transaction fee for Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card. Cash limit is 10% of credit limit up to ₹20,000 for first 180 days.

rewards.earningText: Earn 6 ICICI Reward Points for every ₹200 spent on eligible transactions (3% reward rate)

exclusions.note: No reward points on Fuel, Rent, Government, Tax, E-Wallet loads, and Property Management categories

welcome.description: 12,500 bonus reward points on payment of joining fee + Complimentary Taj Epicure Plus membership (1 year with 1 night stay) + EazyDiner Prime membership

travel.note: Standard 6 RP per ₹200 (3%). Use iShop for accelerated rewards.

dining.note: Standard 6 RP per ₹200 (3%). EazyDiner Prime membership provides additional dining discounts.

online.note: Standard 6 RP per ₹200 (3%) on all online transactions except excluded categories

groceries.note: 6 RP per ₹200 capped at 1000 RP per statement cycle

utilities.note: 6 RP per ₹200 capped at 1000 RP per statement cycle

international.note: Standard 6 RP per ₹200 (3%) on international transactions

insurance.note: 6 RP per ₹200 capped at 5000 RP per statement cycle - a unique benefit as most cards exclude insurance

education.note: 6 RP per ₹200 capped at 1000 RP per statement cycle - a unique benefit as most cards exclude education

rent.note: No rewards on rent payments. 1% fee charged on rent transactions.

walletLoads.note: No rewards on e-wallet loads. 1% fee charged on wallet loads of ₹5,000 or more w.e.f. Jan 15, 2026.

bankPortal.name: iShop
merchants: Gift Vouchers (Amazon, Flipkart, Tanishq, Apple, etc.)
bankPortal.note: 6X rewards on flights and gift vouchers (18% value back), 12X rewards on hotel bookings (36% value back). Accelerated bonus points capped at 18,000 per statement cycle.

redemption.bestOption: Flight/Hotel bookings via iShop or select brand vouchers at 1 RP = ₹1

pointsPlusPay.note: 100% points can be used for flight bookings, 90% for hotel bookings, 50% for gift vouchers on iShop

options.description: Select premium brand vouchers - Apple, Tanishq, Tumi, Coach, Brooks Brothers, Emporio Armani, Jimmy Choo, G-Star Raw, Canali, Mothercare, ITC, Hyatt, Marriott, Taj
Other gift vouchers from rewards catalog

options.note: Lowest value at 1 RP = ₹0.40. Max 50,000 points per statement.

options.description: Transfer to Air India Maharaja Club
options.note: 1:1 transfer ratio. No minimum transfer for Emeralde Private Metal.

partners.name: Air India Maharaja Club
partners.note: Only transfer partner currently available. 1:1 ratio exclusive to Emeralde Private Metal and Times Black cards. Other ICICI cards get 6:1 ratio.

rewards.specialLogic: Unique feature: Rewards on insurance, education, and utility spends with reasonable caps - categories typically excluded by most premium cards.

calculator.formula: basePoints = (spend / 200) * 6; acceleratedPoints for iShop: flights/vouchers = spend * 0.18, hotels = spend * 0.36

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for lounge access. Emeralde Private Metal is excluded from the ₹75,000 quarterly spend requirement applicable to other ICICI cards.

domestic.note: Unlimited complimentary access for both primary and add-on cardholders by swiping the card. Access to VIP section of 080 Lounge at Bangalore Airport.

international.note: Complimentary Priority Pass membership with unlimited access for both primary and add-on cardholders. Access to 1,400+ lounges across 145+ countries.

milestones.conditions: First voucher on reaching ₹4 lakh annual spend

milestones.benefit: Second EaseMyTrip air travel voucher worth ₹3,000 (total ₹6,000 for the year)
milestones.conditions: Second voucher on reaching ₹8 lakh annual spend. Total milestone benefit: ₹6,000/year (0.75% additional return).

golf.courses: Select golf courses in India and 90+ international golf courses via Golftripz
golf.note: Unlimited complimentary golf rounds and lessons for primary cardholder. Book via Golftripz (teetimes.golftripz.com). Benefits credited by 10th of following month, valid for next 2 months. Only 1 booking can be held at any time. Access to international golf courses is rare feature.

movies.offer: Buy 1 Get 1 Free (up to ₹750 off on second ticket)
movies.note: Buy one ticket, get up to ₹750 off on second ticket for movies, theatre, concerts, sports events. Valid twice per month. Effective discount up to ₹1,500/month.

programs.name: EazyDiner Prime
programs.discount: Up to 50% off at partner restaurants
programs.note: Complimentary EazyDiner Prime membership as welcome and renewal benefit. Access to 2,000+ restaurants with discounts up to 50%.

programs.name: Culinary Treats Programme
programs.discount: Up to 20% off at partner restaurants
programs.note: Additional dining discounts at select partner restaurants across India

hotelDining.offer: 25% off on F&B for dine-in and takeaway (max 10 persons), 20% off on Qmin app orders

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions up to ₹4,000 at all petrol pumps. Max waiver ₹1,000 per statement cycle. Applicable for spends up to ₹1,00,000 per statement cycle. Fee of 1% charged on fuel transactions exceeding ₹10,000.

forex.markupText: 2% + GST on international transactions (lower than standard 3.5%)

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency. DCC fee of 2% w.e.f. Jan 15, 2026.

forex.note: Competitive 2% forex markup compared to industry standard of 3.5%. Refunds on foreign currency transactions also attract 2% markup.

concierge.note: Currently available in New Delhi, Mumbai, Bengaluru, and Chennai only

noCostEMI.note: No-cost EMI available on select merchants. Interest subvention may not be passed if EMI is pre-closed.

conversionFee.note: Processing fee of 2.99% capped at ₹299 + GST for Instant EMI w.e.f. Sep 01, 2025

emi.note: EMI conversion available. ROI between 15.99% to 20% depending on tenure and transaction type.

balanceTransfer.note: Balance transfer facility available. Contact bank for current promotional rates.

memberships.name: Taj Epicure Plus
memberships.condition: On payment of joining fee (first year only)
benefits: 25% off on F&B for dine-in and takeaway (max 10 persons)
Access to hotel spa and salon
memberships.note: Welcome benefit only - not renewed annually. Highly valuable membership for Taj loyalists.

memberships.name: EazyDiner Prime
memberships.condition: On joining and renewed annually on payment of annual fee
benefits: Up to 50% off at 2,000+ partner restaurants
memberships.note: Renewed every year as long as card is active with annual fee paid

memberships.name: Priority Pass
benefits: Available for both primary and add-on cardholders
memberships.note: Complimentary membership for unlimited international lounge access

freeNights.condition: Via Taj Epicure Plus membership (first year only)

tripCancellation.condition: Bookings made with the card only. Valid for 4-star and 5-star hotels.
tripCancellation.note: No cancellation charges on travel and hotel bookings. Refund of up to ₹12,000 for max 2 transactions per year.

airAccident.condition: Card must be used at least once in 60 days prior to the event. International travel only. Ticket must be purchased using the card. Supplementary cardholders not eligible.

travelAccident.type: Medical expenses for bodily injury caused by rail/road accident

tripCancellation.note: Via cancellation cover benefit, not traditional insurance

missedConnection.note: Missed connecting international flight during transit

lostPassport.note: Loss of passport and travel related documents

emergencyMedical.condition: Medical expenses for bodily injury due to rail/road accident

fraudLiability.note: Card Liability Cover includes Lost Card Liability, Counterfeit/Skimming/Phishing/Online Fraud Protection

insurance.note: All insurance covers are subject to terms in the policy document provided by ICICI Lombard General Insurance Co. Ltd. Claims to be filed directly with ICICI Lombard at 1800-2666 or ihealthcare@icicilombard.com.

upiLinking.note: Mastercard variant - UPI linking available only for RuPay cards

features: Real-time alerts via SMS, Email, Push

chipAndPin.note: Embedded microchip for enhanced security. PIN required for merchant transactions, not for online.

upgradesFrom.note: Upgrade offered based on relationship and spend history
Upgrade based on high spend, NRV, or wealth management relationship

upgradesTo.note: Higher tier card with ₹20,000 joining fee and ₹25 lakh spend for fee waiver
Ultra-premium card with ₹1.25 lakh joining fee

upgradePathway.note: Invite-only card. Upgrades typically offered to existing ICICI customers with strong banking relationship, high NRV, or consistent high spend on existing cards.

meta.bestFor: High-net-worth individuals who spend ₹10+ lakh annually, value unlimited lounge access, golf privileges, and want good rewards on categories like insurance, education, and utilities typically excluded by other cards. Best for those who can maximize iShop for 18-36% returns on travel.
meta.notRecommendedFor: Low spenders (under ₹8-10 lakh annually), those who prefer airmiles transfers to multiple partners, or those who primarily use UPI for payments. Not suitable for those wanting easy application - invite-only nature makes it hard to obtain.
meta.verdict: ICICI's flagship super-premium card that finally competes with HDFC Infinia. The 3% base reward rate with 1:1 redemption, combined with iShop's 18-36% returns on travel, makes it highly rewarding. Unlimited lounge access without spend requirements, complimentary Taj Epicure with free night stay, and rewards on insurance/education/utilities are standout features. Main drawbacks: only one transfer partner (Air India 1:1), invite-only access, and the valuable Taj Epicure membership is first year only. Excellent for ICICI relationship holders who can leverage iShop and value lifestyle perks.
pros: 3% base reward rate with sensible category caps
iShop offers 18% on flights/vouchers, 36% on hotels
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access for primary and add-on cards
No spend requirement for lounge access (excluded from ₹75K rule)
Rewards on insurance, education, utilities - typically excluded categories
1:1 transfer to Air India Maharaja Club
Complimentary Taj Epicure Plus with 1 night stay (first year)
Low ₹12,499 fee for benefits offered (waivable at ₹10L spend)
cons: Taj Epicure membership not renewed annually
Statement credit value drops to ₹0.40 per point
Add-on card fee of ₹3,500 from Jan 2026
18,000 points monthly cap on iShop accelerated rewards
No rewards on fuel, rent, government payments
dataSource: Official ICICI Bank Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card page
ICICI Bank MITC document dated Dec 12, 2025

changelog.change: Add-on card fee of ₹3,500 + GST becomes applicable as one-time fee
Wallet load fee of 1% on ₹5,000+ transactions
Instant EMI processing fee updated to 2.99% capped at ₹299
Rent, government, education payments excluded from annual fee waiver threshold calculation
Air India Maharaja Club added as 1:1 transfer partner
